it.polimi.dima.mediatracker.external_services.services

Class VideogameService

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.dima.mediatracker.external_services.services.MediaItemService
      • it.polimi.dima.mediatracker.external_services.services.VideogameService

  • public class VideogameService
extends MediaItemService
    Service for videogames that allows to connect to an external API to retrieve data Uses Retrofit external library to manage the connection
